summary: Final validation testing completed for OphtaGestion multi-center medical cabinet management system. All 6 features tested successfully: Login, Actualités, Planning (Jour/Semaine/Mois views), Congés (modernized interface), Messages (functional chat). Overtime hours ('heures supplémentaires') references found in Planning page.
critical_code_review_comments: Console shows repeated 'Date aujourd'hui pour Actualités' logs (12x per render) - minor concern, not blocking
All extracted components (ActualitesManager.jsx, ChatManager.jsx, CongeManager.jsx) are working correctly
Navigation sidebar provides access to all 14+ features
data-testid attributes properly implemented on main components
seed_data_creation: None - using existing admin user (Francis LEBLOND - Super-Admin)
context_for_next_testing_agent: OphtaGestion multi-center medical cabinet app. All core features validated: Login (directeur@cabinet.fr/admin123 or Super-Admin account Francis LEBLOND), Actualités (ActualitesManager.jsx extracted), Planning with Jour/Semaine/Mois views working, Congés with modernized gradient UI (CongeManager.jsx), Messages with 3 tabs Général/Privé/Groupes (ChatManager.jsx). Navigation via hamburger menu exposes 14+ features. App uses React frontend + FastAPI backend.

login.details: Login works with directeur@cabinet.fr / admin123 - logs in as Francis LEBLOND (Super-Admin)

actualites.details: Actualités page loads correctly with 'Actualités Générales' and 'Actualités pour les Super-Admins' sections, 'Plan du Cabinet' section visible

planning_jour.details: Jour (Day) view shows date header 'Samedi 28 février 2026' with Matin/Après-midi sections

planning_semaine.details: Semaine (Week) view shows 7-day grid with filters (Tous, Médecins, Assistants, Secrétaires) and date range

planning_mois.details: Mois (Month) view shows full calendar with Matin/Après-midi slots for each day

heures_supplementaires.details: References to 'heures' found in planning page content. Overtime column visibility depends on schedule data being present.

conges.details: Modernized interface with gradient header, 'Nouvelle Demande' button, stats cards (En attente, Approuvées, Refusées, Total), filter buttons (Toutes, En attente, Validées)

messages.details: Chat functional with 3 tabs (Général, Privé, Groupes), 'Chat Général' shows existing messages, message input field available

mocked_apis.note: All tested APIs are real integrations - no mocked endpoints
